heading: Literature. Stories, plots, etc..
general-note: Here are entered general collections of plots. Works on the construction and analysis of plots as a literary vehicle are entered under. Plots (Drama, novel, etc.).. Collections of plots limited to specific literatures or genres are entered under headings for individual literatures or genres with subdivision. Stories, plots, etc.,. e.g.. English literature--Stories, plots, etc.; Drama--Stories, plots, etc.; American poetry--Stories, plots, etc.. Collections or discussions of plots of individual literary authors are entered under the name of the author with the subdivision. Stories, plots, etc..
